content.text:
# 1977–78 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

During the 1977–78 English football season, Queens Park Rangers competed in the First Division
Season summary
QPR struggled all season but just survived relegation under manager Frank Sibley. In other competitions there were early exits in both the FA Cup and the League Cup
Kit
Adidas remained QPR's kit manufacturers.
League Table
Results
QPR scores given first
First Division
